name: Zombie Apocalypse (itch) (pxdavidson)
description:
A simple Tower Defence game themed around the zombie apocalypse.

3 Levels of increasing difficulty with a reset to level 1 on failure.

Instructions:

  • Place Defenders by Left Clicking on unoccupied tiles.
  • Defenders will cost Resource 
  • Defenders cannot be placed if you have insufficient Resource.
  • Killing Zombies will grant Resource.
  • Each Zombie that reaches your Base will deduct 1 Morale.
  • If Morale reaches 0 your Base will be overrun and your game will end.
  • Use Alt+F4 to Quit
